message: Hello Bob, I believe this product would be a valuable asset to your portfolio. I'm initially offering it at $2,300,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, $1,200,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $1,750,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit lower on the budget. How about $1,450,000?

Bob, I understand your position, but $1,450,000 is really pushing the lower limits of what I can accept. This product is truly exceptional. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,625,000.  This is my final offer.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about $1,575,000?
